publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1898.3 Tommy Sheridan: Improving the Quality and Availability of Scotland’s Housing—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1898) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "views the end of the right to buy and its replacement with a right to rent reduction as necessary to maintaining the amount of affordable social housing for rent and calls on the Scottish Executive to make funding available to allow registered social landlords to build 12,000 houses per annum, in line with the recommendations of the Chartered Institute of Housing and the Scottish Council for Single Homeless."
